channel.title: Hoster?
channel.description:
Hi, i'm looking for someone to host my server, because i can't portforward for a while. I have to use hamachi, and no one ever goes on those servers. If someone can do it, e mail me or post here. My email address is : Cloudstrife01235@msn.com
I don't care how often it's on, just that it's on at least a few hours a day. I'll give you co-owner =\
If you want to do it i will e-mail you the file. Just tell me ur e-mail adress. Please don't flame me it's just a request till i can portforward myself -.-

item.title: Hoster?
item.dc:creator: @Mufalmar Mufalmar
